title: Use AI to trade smarter with this investing app for iPhone and Mac
content:

Whether you’re waiting in line or on your lunch break, you can get investing insights right from your phone.

Prefer a bigger screen? You can also access Sterling Stock Picker from your desktop. It’s also compatible with Android OS, so you can keep tabs on your portfolio wherever and however you work best.
